code: // see issue #5165 - this test fails each time without the fix in pull #5170 public void testStressReaper() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {     int num = randomIntBetween(100, 150).     IndexRequestBuilder[] builders = new IndexRequestBuilder[num].     for (int i = 0. i < builders.length. i++) {         builders[i] = client().prepareIndex("test", "type", "" + i).setSource("f", English.intToEnglish(i)).     }     createIndex("test").     indexRandom(true, builders).     final int iterations = scaledRandomIntBetween(500, 1000).     for (int i = 0. i < iterations. i++) {         SearchResponse searchResponse = client().prepareSearch("test").setQuery(matchAllQuery()).setSize(num).get().         assertNoFailures(searchResponse).         assertHitCount(searchResponse, num).     } }
